summary: These tools let you create animated objects for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightblue][b]Name: Animation Tools N4 - Body Animator[/b][/color]
Date: 2014/02/24
Version: 1.00
Author: Anton

[heading][color=yellow]Update 01:[/color][/heading]
Now you may try to export animated model from 3Dmax too !!!
Many thanks to [u][b]maniczombie[/b][/u] for the script for 3Dmax he was so kind to make.
Try it out please.

Video Tutorial for 3Dmax users from [b]Marthgun[/b]:
[youtube]Oxd5VHoYoNY[/youtube][youtube]C4aLLDwg2rc[/youtube]

[heading][color=yellow]Description:[/color][/heading]
These tools let you export animated model from Blender 2.65+ and import it to a NIF file.
(if someone could remake the scripts, tools can be used with 3Dmax too)


* Instruction how to use these tools is inside the archive.
* Working example of small animated object also exists inside the archive.


[heading][color=yellow]Goal:[/color][/heading]
- creation of unique "alive" objects (like cloth, animals, clutter ...)


[heading][color=yellow]Examples of mods, created by using these tools:[/color][/heading]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271]"Animated Dragon Wings"[/url];
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51031]"Animated Gauntlet _prototype_"[/url];
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46958]"Wolverine Claws _animated_"[/url];
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36414]"Unique Animated Crown"[/url];
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21453]"Summon Animated Larvae"[/url];


[heading][color=yellow]Credits:[/color][/heading]
maniczombie for 3Dmax export script
NifTools team for NifSkope
Microsoft for Visual Studio 2010 Express
Bethesda for the Skyrim
author: Anton
